## Summary

A brief description of the feature or component you're requesting.

## Use Case

Describe the problem this feature would solve or the use case it would enable.

## Proposed Solution

If you have ideas about how this could be implemented, describe them here.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds?

## Design Reference

For new components, please include a link to the Material Design 3 specification if applicable:

- [MD3 Components](https://m3.material.io/components)

## Examples

Links to similar implementations in other libraries or screenshots/mockups if available.

## Additional Context

Any other information that would help us understand this request.
